extension.description: Download and install PVR add-ons from the Official XBMC.org add-on repository.[CR] By using the official Repository you will be able to take advantage of our extensive file mirror service to help get you faster downloads from a region close to you.[CR] All add-ons on this repository have under gone basic testing, if you find a broken or not working add-on please report it to Team XBMC so we can take any action needed.
extension.disclaimer: Team XBMC did not make all the add-ons on this repository and are not responsible for their content
